name: Technical Expertise
description: Proficiency in technical skills, knowledge, and abilities relevant to the role.

name: Problem Solving
description: Ability to identify, analyze, and solve complex problems effectively.

name: Communication
description: Ability to convey information clearly and effectively both verbally and in writing.

name: Leadership
description: Ability to guide, influence, and inspire others to achieve goals.

name: Adaptability
description: Ability to adjust to new conditions, challenges, and environments.

name: Teamwork
description: Ability to work collaboratively with others toward common goals.

name: Initiative
description: Willingness to take action and responsibility without being prompted.

name: Attention to Detail
description: Thoroughness in accomplishing tasks with precision and accuracy.

name: Strategic Thinking
description: Ability to develop long-term plans and solutions that align with goals.

name: Result Orientation
description: Focus on achieving outcomes and measurable results.

name: Customer Focus
description: Understanding and meeting the needs of customers or clients.

name: Innovation
description: Ability to generate new ideas and approach situations in creative ways.

name: Action Oriented
description: Takes on new opportunities and tough challenges with a sense of urgency, high energy, and enthusiasm.
questions: Tell me about a time when you took initiative on a project without being asked.
Describe a situation where you had to act quickly to solve a problem.

name: Instills Trust
description: Gains the confidence and trust of others through honesty, integrity, and authenticity.
questions: Tell me about a time when your integrity was challenged. How did you handle it?
Describe a situation where you had to build trust with a skeptical team or client.

name: Collaborative
description: Builds partnerships and works collaboratively with others to meet shared objectives.
questions: Give me an example of when you worked with a team to accomplish a goal.
Tell me about a time when you had to collaborate with someone who had a different working style.

name: Strategic Mindset
description: Sees ahead to future possibilities and translates them into breakthrough strategies.
questions: Tell me about a time when you identified a future opportunity and developed a strategy to capitalize on it.
Describe a situation where you had to think long-term while also addressing immediate needs.

name: Decision Making
description: Makes good and timely decisions that keep the organization moving forward.
questions: Tell me about a difficult decision you had to make with limited information.
Describe a situation where you had to make a quick decision under pressure.

name: Leadership
description: Attracts, develops, and motivates a diverse team of people.
questions: Tell me about a time when you had to lead a team through a difficult situation.
Describe your approach to developing and mentoring team members.

name: Introduction
description: Basic introductory questions to start an interview.
questions: Tell me about yourself and your background.
Walk me through your resume and career progression.
Why are you interested in this position?
What attracted you to our company?
